directions.step:
Fill each jar half full with cherries. Add to each one slice lemon and one tablespoon sugar. Then fill to the top with V.O. Put the lid on tight, shake and put in cool place for 6 months. The cherries are the most delicious part of the drink; feed one to your lover!
